pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Sken CLIThe full documentation for skencli can be found here:http://docs.sken.ai/en/articles/4331879-advanced-settings-set-up-sken-cli-and-sken-yaml----------For test purposes only, you can run:```skencli --test```In this state, the CLI will read from `skentest.yaml` and communicate with our test servers. The `orgid` and `appid` specified in `skentest.yaml` must come from our test servers.
